Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3116 affecting package heimdal for versions less than 7.7.1-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-3116 affecting package heimdal for versions less than 7.7.1-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package heimdal is earlier than 7.7.1-4, affected by CVE-2022-3116
